description: The advertisement features a striking black background with bold white and red text that immediately draws attention. Prominently displayed at the center is the message: 'Black Friday & Cyber Monday Sale!' in large, impactful font. Below this, in an eye-catching red banner, is the offer '50% Off Everything!' The store's address '123 Anywhere St., Any City' is displayed in a smaller font at the bottom, along with the website 'www.yourwebsite.com' for easy access.

captions.background: The background is completely black, providing a dramatic contrast to the bold text and images in the foreground, emphasizing the urgency and excitement of the sale.
captions.objects: The main objects in the design are the text elements, featuring large, bold lettering for the sale announcement and discount. The use of red for the discount banner adds a sense of urgency and grabs attention. There may also be decorative elements like shopping bags or gift icons subtly placed to enhance the shopping theme.

heading: Black Friday & Cyber Monday Sale!
50% Off Everything!
sub_heading: Don't miss out on incredible deals!
